jd: From: Pratheep Jayakumar, Stellar IT Solutions pratheepj@stellarit.com Reply to: pratheepj@stellarit.com Hi I represent Stellar IT Solutions a Global IT Solution provider headquartered in Rockville, MD with operations in the US and India. Stellar IT Solutions has over 15 years of IT and consulting experience to give cost effective solutions to many Fortune 500 companiesI saw your resume online and wanted to check your availability for a new project assignment that we have. Given below are a few details about the same.Position Title: Support Services Project Manager - SR 5211575 Duration: Long TermLocation: St, Baton, LouisianaJob Description:Provide day-to-day project management support;Activity and resource planning;Creation of project documentation: daily, weekly, semi-monthly and monthly status reports; project schedules and plans, meeting minutes, risks and issues, other documentation as needed;Analyzing project risks and issues, help identify ways to mitigate risks;Process monitoring;Monitor project deliverables;Provide day-to-day support for on-going processes;Provide on-going evaluation and improvements for processes; work in needed areas to provide support services for agency’s workload demands.Documentation of specifications and requirements tracking;Conduct cost/benefit analysis;Thanks & Regards,Pratheep JayakumarTechnical RecruiterEmail: pratheepj@stellarit.comRockville, MD | McLean, VA | Palo Alto, CAStellarIT.com | StellariDeaLabs.com
